title: 20: OBITCH put on your skin-ny jeans!
description:
OBITCH! This week Spencer and Madison are talking death symbols, mourning outfits, and a little thing called necropants..we’ll explain. We’ve got an obituary from haddonfield a guy who’s waiting for a drink on the other side and of course some dumb.ass.criminalssssss! 
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sources: 
https://www.flowersnear.com/blog/flowers-for-grief-9-of-the-best-sympathy-flowers-and-their-meaning/floralqueen.com  https://www.joincake.com/blog/symbols-of-mourning https://www.joincake.com/blog/mourning-colors/ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black#:~:text=Black%20was%20one%20of%20the%20first%20colors%20used,frequently%20associated%20with%20death%2C%20evil%2C%20witches%2C%20and%20magic http://www.thedailychina.org/chinese-flower-symbolism-the-chrysanthemum/ https://funeralflowerssingapore.com/funeral-flowers/chrysanthemum-flower/ https://artsandculture.google.com/story/fwISZyrkPUt0IA https://artsandculture.google.com/story/fwISZyrkPUt0IA churchtimes.co.uk  royal.uk https://www.nytimes.com/2005/03/08/movies/debra-hill-54-film-producer-who-helped-create-halloween-dies.html https://osirissoftware.com/understanding-the-different-colors-of-mourning/ https://listverse.com/2019/07/25/10-products-made-from-human-body-parts-and-secretions/ https://www.dallasnews.com/news/crime/2018/05/09/arlington-officers-find-bags-of-drugs-while-responding-to-accidental-sos-call/ https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/objects-of-intrigue-necropant https://guidetoiceland.is/history-culture/witchcraft-in-iceland See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
